meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix, Adverb (fukushi)
Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. behind; rear See also 後ずさり少女たちのうち一人が後に残された。One of the girls was left behind.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. after; later See also その後雨天の後には晴天が来る。After rain comes fair weather.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

meanings.meaning: 4. more (e.g. five more minutes); left あと２通手紙を書かなくてはならない。I have another two letters to write.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 7. after one's death 藤さんがあとに４人の子を残して死にました。Mr. Fuji died, leaving 4 children behind him.

meanings.meaning: 1. buttocks; behind; rump; bottom; hips 彼は女の子の尻ばかり追いかけている。He's always chasing girls.
1. buttocks; behind; rump; bottom; hips 彼は女の子の尻ばかり追いかけている。He's always chasing girls.
1. to be late; to be delayed; to fall behind schedule; to be overdue usu. 遅れる
2. to fall behind (in a race, one's studies, etc.); to lag behind; to be behind (the times) oft. 後れる彼女は勉強が非常に後れている。She's far behind in her studies.
3. to be bereaved of; to be preceded by (someone) in death oft. 後れる
4. to be slow (of a clock or watch)
1. to be late; to be delayed; to fall behind schedule; to be overdue usu. 遅れる
2. to fall behind (in a race, one's studies, etc.); to lag behind; to be behind (the times) oft. 後れる彼女は勉強が非常に後れている。She's far behind in her studies.
3. to be bereaved of; to be preceded by (someone) in death oft. 後れる
4. to be slow (of a clock or watch)

sentences.translation: She's far behind in her studies.

meanings.meaning: 1. second half; latter half See also 前半

meanings.meaning: 1. behind; in the rear; in back Antonym: 前方 ぜんぽう

meanings.type: Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
Na-adjective (keiyodoshi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 2. backward-looking; retrogressive; reactionary; retrospective; negative Antonym: 前向き
2. pushing from behind (a cart, etc.); pusher
1. settlement (of a matter); sorting out; winding up (affairs); dealing with the aftermath
2. cleaning up afterwards; tidying up (when finished) 出かける前に火の後始末をしなさい。Be sure to put out the fire before you leave.

sentences.translation: Be sure to put out the fire before you leave.

meanings.meaning: 午后: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage.
1. end; conclusion 大丈夫、誠実でいれば最後には報われるよ。I can assure you that honesty pays in the long run.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. last; final; latest; most recent 伝説の最後の部分は後世付け加えられたものだ。The last part of the legend was added later.
3. no sooner than; once; right after (often having negative consequences) after -tara form or -ta form followed by "ga"
4. one's final moments Archaic, See also 最期

sentences.translation: I can assure you that honesty pays in the long run.
The last part of the legend was added later.

meanings.meaning: 1. front and rear; front and back; before and behind; back and forth 彼は首を前後に振りました。He shook his head back and forth.

meanings.type: Noun, used as a suffix, Noun, Adverb (fukushi)
meanings.meaning: 3. around; about; approximately after a quantity, age, time, etc.日本のＯＤＡは返済期間３０年、利率２％前後という条件の緩い円借款が大部分を占める。Japan's ODA largely consists of concessionary yen credit repayable in 30 years, carrying an interest rate of 2% or so.
4. order; context 倒置法は言葉の前後を入れ替えることにより文章を強調する効果があります。Anastrophe, by switching around words, has the effect of emphasizing text.
6. just when; around the time of
7. inversion; reversion; getting out of order
8. co-occurring; happening at the same time as 前後して

sentences.translation: He shook his head back and forth.
Japan's ODA largely consists of concessionary yen credit repayable in 30 years, carrying an interest rate of 2% or so.
Anastrophe, by switching around words, has the effect of emphasizing text.

meanings.meaning: 1. after this; from now on; hereafter 以後こんなことはいたしません。I'll never do this again.
2. thereafter; since (then); after esp. after あれ, それ or the -te form of a verbそれ以後彼女に会っていません。I haven't seen her since then.

sentences.translation: I haven't seen her since then.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

meanings.meaning: 1. being too late; losing one's final chance 手後れにならないうちに、必要な措置を取るべきです。We should take the necessary steps before it's too late.

sentences.translation: We should take the necessary steps before it's too late.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. wrong (e.g. direction) Only applies to あさって, See also あさっての方を向く
あさって: Gikun (meaning as reading) or jukujikun (special kanji reading).
